vigil.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a period of time, especially during the night, when you stay awake in order to pray, remain with someone who is ill, or watch for danger
vigil.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Eva and Paul kept a constant vigil by their daughterâ€™s hospital bedside.
vigil.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a silent political protest in which people wait outside a building, especially during the night
vigil.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Two thousand demonstrators held a candle-lit vigil outside the embassy.
